articles.author: Dasha Litvinova
articles.title: Putin blames West for tensions, demands security guarantees - Associated Press
articles.description: MOSCOW (AP) — The Russian president on Tuesday reiterated his demand for guarantees from the U.S. and its allies that NATO will not expand eastwards, blaming the West for “tensions that are building up in Europe.”
articles.content: MOSCOW (AP) The Russian president on Tuesday reiterated his demand for guarantees from the U.S. and its allies that NATO will not expand eastwards, blaming the West for tensions that are building up … [+5230 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: UK says COVID surge 'extremely difficult' as Omicron grips Europe - The Star Online
articles.description: LONDON: British Prime Minister Boris Johnson said on Monday he would tighten coronavirus curbs to slow the spread of the Omicron variant if needed, after the Netherlands began a fourth lockdown and as other European nations consider Christmas restrictions.
